channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Watching The Leopard
item.description: On a new adaptation of Lampedusa’s classic, timeless novel.

item.title: H2Go: How experts, industry leaders say US hydrogen is fuel for the future of agriculture, energy, security
item.description: PNWHA president Chris Green said, "Hydrogen has a lot of dexterity as a molecule, and it can be used for a host of different things."

item.title: RFK Jr makes Texas stop to visit family of 6-year-old measles victim, push MMR vaccine
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. made a stop in Texas on Sunday to visit the family of a 6-year-old girl who died in February after contracting the measles.

item.description: Yes, the government has the power to do this, but it must be done in the right way.

item.description: At least once a year, D.C. is a mortality play.

item.description: Mark Cuban is warning that tariffs and DOGE cuts could result in long-term pain for the U.S. economy.

item.title: Donald Trump shares video claiming he’s ‘purposefully crashing the market’—but then insists ‘he doesn’t want anything to go down’

item.title: How Tariffs Encourage Waste
item.description: Tariffs channel our energies into avoiding taxes rather than into making things people want.

item.title: Boeing starts to face first civil trial over 2019 Ethiopian Airlines 737 MAX crash that killed 157
item.description: Relatives of 155 of the victims had sued Boeing between April 2019 and March 2021 for wrongful death, negligence and other charges.
